sentence.Network_en: I know full well my reputation as a provocateur, but am not worried.

list.abs: 如今,大内密探 (Agent Provocateur) 在英国已拥有4家店和2个特许商店,在美国开了2家,并计划在莫斯科、都柏林、迪拜、北美和东南亚新增5家代销店。然而,大内密探.

means.word_mean: 1. a secret agent who incites suspected persons to commit illegal acts
